name: Swirl
tagline: A Full-spectrum Ideas Agency in San Francisco
description:
Swirl is independently owned and independent in spirit. With headquarters in San Francisco’s majestic Presidio National Park, it’s a full-spectrum ideas agency:  advertising, marketing, communications, retail experiences, and brand action. 
We believe: in people first, in collaboration, and in a healthy and passionate culture. We also believe that brand success in the 21st century will be rooted in brand actions and our clients range from national and international brands.
